name: PC_GROUP
value:
CASE
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0001' THEN 'LP'
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0013' THEN 'LP'
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0015' THEN 'LP'
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0021' THEN 'LP'
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0025' THEN 'LP'
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0091' THEN 'LP'
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0002' THEN 'FL'
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0003' THEN 'FL'
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0016' THEN 'FL'
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0018' THEN 'FL'
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0019' THEN 'FL'
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0029' THEN 'FL'
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0092' THEN 'FL'
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0004' THEN 'TS'
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0014' THEN 'TS'  
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0023' THEN 'TS'  
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0026' THEN 'TS'
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0094' THEN 'TS'  
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0097' THEN 'TS'  
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0005' THEN 'LA' 
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0017' THEN 'LA' 
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0027' THEN 'LA' 
    WHEN "RBKP"."BUKRS" = '0024' THEN 'DS' 
    ELSE 'OTHERS'
END

name: VAR_VBUND
value:
CASE
    WHEN ISNULL("LFA1"."VBUND") = 1 THEN 'External'
    ELSE 'Internal'
END
